code: import axios from"axios";import{CAKE_FETCH_SEARCH_REQUEST,CAKE_FETCH_SEARCH_SUCCESS,CAKE_FETCH_SEARCH_ERROR,CAKE_FETCH_ALL_SUCCESS,CAKE_FETCH_ALL_REQUEST,CAKE_FETCH_ALL_ERROR,FETCH_ALL_CAKES,FETCH_SEARCH_CAKES}from"./cakeTypes";export var fetchAllCakesRequest=function fetchAllCakesRequest(){return{type:CAKE_FETCH_ALL_REQUEST};};export var fetchAllCakesSuccess=function fetchAllCakesSuccess(payload){return{type:CAKE_FETCH_ALL_SUCCESS,payload:payload};};export var fetchAllCakesError=function fetchAllCakesError(payload){return{type:CAKE_FETCH_ALL_ERROR,payload:payload};};export var fetchSearchCakesRequest=function fetchSearchCakesRequest(){return{type:CAKE_FETCH_SEARCH_REQUEST};};export var fetchSearchCakesSuccess=function fetchSearchCakesSuccess(payload){return{type:CAKE_FETCH_SEARCH_SUCCESS,payload:payload};};export var fetchSearchCakesError=function fetchSearchCakesError(payload){return{type:CAKE_FETCH_SEARCH_ERROR,payload:payload};};export var fetchAllCakes=function fetchAllCakes(){return{type:FETCH_ALL_CAKES};};export var fetchSearchCakes=function fetchSearchCakes(searchText){return{type:FETCH_SEARCH_CAKES,searchText:searchText};};
